sections.sectionType: Use only one of the following options: Header, Hero, Secondary Navigation Menu, Call to Action, Services, About Us, Testimonials, FAQs, Pricing, Contacts, Blog, Partners, Footer

background.type: Use only one of the following options: color, image

sectionContent.contentType: Use only one of the following options: single, slider

borderRadius.topLeftPx: Value is a number of px
borderRadius.topRightPx: Value is a number of px
borderRadius.bottomLeftPx: Value is a number of px
borderRadius.bottomRightPx: Value is a number of px

background.type: Use only one of the following options: color, image

sectionContent.width: Value in percentage; skip this field if the value is 100%
sectionContent.marginTop: Number of px in format like 0px; skip this field if the value is 0px
sectionContent.marginBottom: Number of px in format like 0px; skip this field if the value is 0px

grid.width: Value in percentage; skip this field if the value is 100%
grid.gridAlignment: Use only one of the following options: top, center, bottom
grid.marginTop: Number of px in format like 0px; skip this field if the value is 0px
grid.marginBottom: Number of px in format like 0px; skip this field if the value is 0px

columns.size: Number of columns and the sum of their sizes can't exceed 12

widgets.elementType: Use only one of the following options: text, search-box, login, cart, menu, image, button, form, social-links, box, logo, spacer, divider, accordion.
widgets.textType: Use only one of the following options: heading1, heading2, heading3, heading4, subheading, normal, link. It is applicable only when the elementType is text; otherwise skip this field.
widgets.charsCount: Number of letters in the text. This is a required field for text elementType; otherwise skip this field.
widgets.elementColor: Color in HEX format. This is a required field for search-box, login, cart elementTypes; otherwise skip this field.
items: For example, 'About Us', 'Projects', 'Contacts'. This is used only for the menu type; otherwise skip it.
widgets.align: Use only one of the following options: left, center, right. This must be used only for the menu and social-links widgets or if the fitType is fit; otherwise skip this field.
widgets.fitType: Use only one of the following options: fit, fill. This is used only for the image and button types; otherwise, skip this field.
widgets.width: Value in percentage. It is applicable only when the fitType is fit; otherwise skip this field.
widgets.color: Color in HEX format. This must be used only for the image and divider types; otherwise skip this field.
widgets.height: It must be from 20px to 300px. This must be used only for image and spacer types; otherwise skip this field.

borderRadius.$desc: This must be used only for only image and box types.
borderRadius.topLeftPx: Value is a number of px
borderRadius.topRightPx: Value is a number of px
borderRadius.bottomLeftPx: Value is a number of px
borderRadius.bottomRightPx: Value is a number of px

widgets.type: Use only one of the following options: vertical, horizontal. This must be used only for the form and box types; otherwise skip this field.
widgets.buttonType: Use only one of the following options: primary, secondary. This must be used only for the button type; otherwise skip this field.
widgets: This must be used only for box widget. Paste inner widgets here.

background.$desc: This must be used only for the box type.
background.type: Use only one of the following options: color, image

fontData.$desc: This must be used only for the text, menu, logo types.

fontData.textAlign: Use only one of the following options: left, center, right

widgets.itemsCount: Number of items. This must be used only for the social-links, form, and accordion types.
